Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or block
Purpose: To detect the 18q11.2 (SS18/SYT) gene rearrangement by FISH for confirmation of synovial sarcoma diagnosis.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: FISH probes, fluorescence microscope, heat block or thermal cycler, humidified hybridization chamber
